content:
# The furnace has successfully produced 2 iron plates and still has 5 iron ore remaining. 
# I will now extract the 2 iron plates from the furnace.

# Extracting the produced iron plates from the furnace.
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace_entity.position, quantity=2)  # Taking the 2 iron plates

# After extraction, I will check the inventory to confirm the update.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Inspecting the inventory after extracting iron plates
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking entities on the map for any status changes
